StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Having 2 years of Experience in developing project using Core Java, and Spring Frameworks. Good knowledge in Data Structure and Multithreading. Good Implementation knowledge in Object Oriented Programming concepts. Experience in developing Rest based web services. Possess good communication and interpersonal skills.

PositionHistory.Title: Software Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
PROJECT: Project: Leading HealthCare Company in Switzerland Language Used: Core Java, SpringBoot, Spring Jpa, Spring Data, Restfull WebServices Database Layer: Cosmos DB
DESCRIPTION OF THE PROJECT: Iconnect is a health Domain project basically meant to administer and link all the Gateways in the market with the Central Gateway. It also provides information about all the IOT Instruments to the Gateways (i.e. the health status of the Instruments). It helps to create Entity, Admin, User and the Gateways. It also monitors all the Admins and reports their activities to the Global Administrator.
ROLE: As a developer, I have worked on creation of gateways, fetching all the data's of the gateways, monitoring the
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ e580a4b1179465e401804435a0e176&sid=3810263223&AT=1580681853 2/2/20 23&18
creation/updating/ deletion of the entities, gateways, instruments, listing all the instruments related to gateways and deleting it if they are not connected, validating presence of the user_ids, listing all the user, listing all the previous uploaded softwares, sending emails to Admins that should be concerned, deleting/ activating/deactivating the entity and written various test Case scenarios using mockito

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 61% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Electronics/Telecommunication) from Haldia Institute of Technology (HIT) in 2017

Qualifications.QualificationSummary:
Key Skills: Software Developer, Data Structure, Algorithm, Requirement Gathering, MultiThreading, Unit Testing, Coding, Debugging, Spring Boot, Spring Jpa, Spring Data, Spring Mvc, Core Java, git, github, Intellij, Postman, Application Maintenance
